segments.advisor_message: Thank you for joining me today. To get started, could you please provide me with your full name as you would like it to appear in our records?
segments.client_message: Sure! My name is John Michael Smith, but you can just call me John. That’s what I go by usually.

segments.advisor_message: Great, John! Now, if you don’t mind, could you share your date of birth and place of birth? This will help us with accurate record-keeping.
segments.client_message: Um, yeah! I was born on 15-03-1985, and I’m from Seattle. So, that would be Seattle for the place of birth.

segments.advisor_message: Thank you for that information. Lastly, would you mind sharing your marital status and contact details, such as phone numbers and email?
segments.client_message: Of course! I’m currently single. You can reach me at my mobile, which is 555-0123, and my email is john.smith@email.com.
